course_description: Prerequisites: Hebrew 202 or permission of instructor. Fifth in a series of courses designed to teach modern Hebrew, advanced study of grammar, vocabulary, and stylistics; intensive practice speaking and writing Hebrew.
sections: Class Nbr: 2266, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: P. Kahlon, Status: Open
